amendment.description: An amendment, as modified, to cut $6,572,000,000 from the bill's overall funding, bringing the total down to the level contained in the "Coalition" budget.

action.text: Schroeder amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent. The modification corrects a clerical error in the dollar amount of the amendment, from $6,572,000 to $6,572,000,000.
On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A008) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 265 (Roll no. 244).
